Once upon a time, there was a fluffy little cloud named Nimbus who lived low in the sky. Unlike other clouds that soared high above the world, Nimbus was terrified of heights. He watched in envy as his friends danced in the sunlight, casting shadows over the fields below. One day, a gentle breeze encouraged Nimbus to rise just a little higher. To his surprise, he discovered a breathtaking view and a newfound confidence. He realized that heights werenâ€™t as scary as he thought. From that day on, Nimbus floated higher, spreading joy and rain wherever he went, embracing his fears.
